Dr. K. Y,

Tients, North Cheon.

Your Batter of the 4th 7 November ou mining check for live hundred 
dollars we duly received by me yesterday. I have deposited the money in question 
to the account of your son, and will see that it is expanded in accordance with 
your request, in furthering your boys education and in meeting the entendaal en 
pages of the one. In order that you may new sent to

his account slightly, and naturally felt somewhat concerned about it.

Insure you that is real pleasure to me to be able to render parts 
alight distance to our Chinese boy, 30 tar say from home, and other parents,

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter acknowledging receipt of the draft for $500 credited to his son's account and enclosing a statement of account. He states he has just met with Sung Sing who was concerned because he had overdrawn his account.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
